questions.question: What is the purpose of the `<!DOCTYPE html>` declaration?
options: It specifies the HTML version and ensures the browser renders the page in standards mode.
It defines the character encoding of the document.
It links external CSS files to the HTML document.
It sets the viewport settings for responsive design.
questions.answer: It specifies the HTML version and ensures the browser renders the page in standards mode.

questions.question: How do you create a multi-line comment in HTML?
What is the use of the `data-*` attribute in HTML?
options: To store custom data on HTML elements.
To define the style of an element.
To link JavaScript functions to HTML elements.
To specify the source of an image.
questions.answer: To store custom data on HTML elements.

questions.question: Which element is used to define a section in a webpage in HTML5?
What is the purpose of the `<noscript>` tag?
options: To define content to be displayed if JavaScript is not supported or disabled.
To create a placeholder for scripts.
To define a section of the document for JavaScript code.
questions.answer: To define content to be displayed if JavaScript is not supported or disabled.

questions.question: How can you include a JavaScript file in an HTML document?
Which HTML element is used to define a group of related form elements?
How do you define a hyperlink that opens in a new tab?
What is the purpose of the `<meta charset='UTF-8'>` tag?
options: To specify the character encoding for the document.
To link to external CSS files.
questions.answer: To specify the character encoding for the document.

questions.question: How do you create an ordered list with Roman numerals in HTML?
Which HTML attribute specifies the alternative text for an image?
What does the `<meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'>` tag do?
options: It controls the viewport settings for responsive design.
It specifies the document's character encoding.
It links to external CSS files.
It sets the title of the webpage.
questions.answer: It controls the viewport settings for responsive design.

questions.question: How do you create a form input field that only accepts email addresses?
Which element is used to define a template that can be used later in the HTML document?
What is the function of the `hreflang` attribute in an `<a>` tag?
options: To specify the language of the linked document.
To set the relationship of the link.
To define the type of content in the link.
To open the link in a new window.
questions.answer: To specify the language of the linked document.

questions.question: How do you include a CSS stylesheet in an HTML document?
